name: Stranded Monster
description:
You are a little Monster who stranded on an Unknown Planet. You got infected with a local Virus in the process which make you Out of Control once in a while. You have to fight your way and survive Waves of Enemies before your friends come and pick you up. Be sure to find Items along the way. Good Luck! :)

Controls (Before going Out of Control): 

LeftMouse = Fire Rocket 

RightMouse = Swing Sword 

Q = Use Item 

E = Eat 

F = Extinguish Fire 

R = ???

Music:

Chase 8-bit by Volvion (https://freesound.org/people/Volvion/sounds/315717/)
